laboratory_examinations.findings: Instances of hypothyroidism documented by laboratory studies.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Seven women developed clinically significant hypothyroidism after starting lithium; five were rapid cyclers.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initially diffusely abnormal EEG, improved by mid-January, and normalized by discharge.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement noted in EEG from abnormal to normal range by discharge.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Elevated tricyclic antidepressant plasma level (imipramine plus desipramine = 540 ng/ml).
Serum lithium levels could not be obtained due to patient's inability to cooperate.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient eventually was able to cooperate with lithium therapy after a course of ECT.
